name: VIRGINIANS FOR EFFECTIVE AND EFFICIENT (WETLANDS) PERMIT PROCESSING
description: Coalition supporting increased funding at US Army Corps for wetlands permitting personnel
sampleDescriptions: Increase funding for wetlands permit, delineation and mitigation bank application processing personnel at the Us Army Corps of Engineers.

Increase funding to provide additional regulatory personnel at the US Army Corps of Engineers for the processing of applications for wetlands delineations, wetlands permits and wetlands and stream mit
